## BrainWorkup Neuropsychology

Led by [Dr. Joey Trampush](joey-trampush/index.qmd), USC Keck School of Medicine faculty member, we provide expert neuropsychological evaluations in Marina Del Rey, serving all of Southern California.

**Our Focus:**
- Comprehensive diagnostic testing for ADHD, autism, learning disabilities, and cognitive concerns
- Evidence-based assessment protocols with clear, actionable recommendations
- Detailed reports that help you advocate for needed services and accommodations

**Important:** We are a diagnostic assessment center only—not a therapy provider. Evaluations typically require 4-8 hours across multiple sessions.

Schedule your evaluation: **(213) 495-1155** | [Schedule Online](contact/index.qmd#online-inquiry)

## Our Data-Driven Approach

We transform complex assessment data into clear, actionable insights using:

- Advanced statistical analysis and pattern detection
- Custom visualizations that make cognitive profiles easy to understand
- Translation of technical findings into practical recommendations

This approach enables more precise diagnosis and more effective, personalized interventions.
